my_favourite_bni_story: The purpose of joining BNI was obvious for business growth and network. But I was missing the corporate culture for quiet some years which I enjoyed for 15 years of my early career. When back in 2019 I visited a BNI chapter as a visitor, where I found around 40 members along with ED Ms. Sanjana Shah were present by early 7.30 AM. I found the group was so energetic, enthusiastic, disciplined and every one was keen on passing business leads to each other. That was a moment I found that GIVERS GAIN can be a tools of market your self and your business in such a positive way. Since then I am enjoying each and every moment with BNI with lots of learnings.
